title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy. 3. In a bowl, whisk the eggs and Parmesan together. 4. Drain the pasta and toss with the pancetta and egg mixture. 5. Season with black pepper and serve.
